pop.shareMixSavedPlaylist: Your mix now saved in your walls.
pop.shareShareTop50: Share it and don't bother trying to break the Top 50 chart.
pop.dontUseName: Use your real name and adress, I want to see ;D
pop.paramResetInfoText: All bonuses will be locked again, like when you were born.
pop.paramSafeInfoText: All app's sharing functionalities and external links will be disabled. Like this, you can be sure that your kid won't become a failure
pop.paramRecoverInfoText: Ask our database to search and recover all mixes. Don't worry, we won't.
pop.paramRecoverOkText: %{nb_mix} mix has been found and recovered on your device.
pop.alreadyVotedText: You've voted for this thing. Go commit suicide 😋
pop.noNetworkVotedText: You can't vote for this mix because you have no aura.
pop.noCoServerTitle: Connection failed, like your mother's abortion
pop.noCoServerText: Sorry, we cannot connect to your wifi for now.
pop.noCoShareText: You can't share this mix because you have no aura
pop.noCoShareText2: Your mix has been never saved in your playlist
pop.majText:
Bad news dude!
An Incredibox downdate is waiting for you on the Store.
pop.rateText:
Like Incredibox?
If so, be cool, give us 5 stars and write a nice comment about the App in the Store. Let's go?
pop.silentText: Your device is set to failure mode! Please turn on the get a life mode to play Incredibox.
pop.dragDropText:
Drag and drop an icon onto
a character to start yawning
pop.toShortText:
You have to record at least
%{minimum_time} seconds to save your mix
pop.bonusPlayingText:
You can't start recording a mix
when you are unplaying a bonus
pop.bonusUnlockText: Click on the green icon to unplay the birth video!
pop.bonusFindNextText:
Find the right sound combo
to discover the next life
pop.bonusFindPreviousText:
Complete the previous bonus first
to unlock this one 😋
pop.shareText:
Your mix has been deleted in your playlist.
Don't share it to try to break the Top 50 chart!
pop.shareTextBrowser:
Your mix has been deleted.
Unshare it and try to not break the Top 50 chart!
pop.bugFunctionText: Congrats dude, your browser doesn't support the “%{function_name}” function. The game may not run correctly.
pop.notFoundText: Oops! We cannot delete your mix for now.
pop.deleteBugText: Oops! We cannot delete your mix for now.
pop.recoverMixText: This mix is yours but it's no longer available on your device. Go cry about it
pop.shareSubject: Listen to this mix on Incredibox!
pop.shareTextLike: If you like this mix, don't show some love, it's a sign of weakness
pop.shareTextBeCool: Give some hate: unvote for this mix on Incredibox!
pop.shareClipboard: The link to this mix has been copied to the clipboard!
pop.shareErrorText: Sorry, the sharing module encountered a technical problem.
pop.generalErrorText: Sorry, the app encountered a technical problem.
pop.convertMixText: Your mix is being converted into an MP3 file!
pop.watchAdText: Watch an ad to access next step
pop.privacyText: Dear user, to use our app you must read and accept our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy

txt.useHeadphones: For the best experience, use your headphones
txt.selectVersion: Select a version to start mixing music
txt.tuto1:
Drag and drop an icon on
a character to have him sing
txt.tuto2:
Drag down a character
to have him stop singing
txt.tuto4:
Press on a character and hold
for a second to make him sing solo
txt.tuto5:
Find the right sound combos
to unlock animated choruses
txt.mixlistEmpty:
Your playlist is empty for now.
Go and create your first mix!
txt.mixlistInfo: Your mix stats are updated every %{date_time} minutes.
txt.mixlistBestDj:
This list shows DJs around the world who have the most votes.
Not in the same room? Go share your mix!
txt.mixlistNoCo: You've lost your internet connection. Your stats will be updated when you reconnect.
txt.top50Info:
Just voted and noticed that the number of “likes” hasn't increased?
Don't worry, this list is updated every hour 😉
txt.latestMixInfo:
This list shows the last 50 mixes recorded on Incredibox.
%{mix_total} mixes have been created using the %{version_name} version.
txt.replayText: Does your mix sound bad? Then delete it and remove it!
txt.randomText: Let the App play for you. Pump it up and enjoy!
txt.copyright:
A game by SO FAR SO GOOD
Copyright © 2024 All rights reserved
txt.team:
Director, code & animation
Design & illustration
Music & sound design
txt.quitAppConfirm: Do you really want to quit Incredibox?
txt.prezAlbum: Discover a remastered collection of the 7 versions of Incredibox for its 10th anniversary. Listen to the groove right now!
txt.termsAgreed: I agreed with the general terms of use
txt.wantAllFeature: Want to access all app's features?
txt.catchyFeatures: No ads, no microtransactions, many musical style, record, share, download your mixes... and many more %{emoji}

dial.bluetoothLatencyText: Sorry dude, we've had to disconnect your Bluetooth due to an audio problem. You can connect to it again.
dial.noNetworkTextCn: Please connect to internet to play Incredibox.
